definition: Gospel according to St John
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
surname Han
writing brush/writing/pen
good fortune/happiness/luck
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: This story in John 3 is not the whole story about Nicodemus.
sentences.chinese: 約翰福音第3章並非尼哥底母故事的全部。

sentences.english: In John 21, Jesus told Peter that he would die a martyr’s death.
sentences.chinese: 在約翰福音第21章，主耶穌告訴彼得他殉道而死。

sentences.english: He's Jesus' favorite disciple in the Gospel of John.
sentences.chinese: 在約翰福音中，他是主最喜愛的門徒。

sentences.english: Read the execution narrative in the Gospel of John.
sentences.chinese: 看看約翰福音中是怎麼敘述行刑的。

sentences.english: And that John was written by the disciple of John.
sentences.chinese: 還有約翰福音是由約翰的信徒執筆。

sentences.english: Okay,yes it happens at the very beginning of the Gospel.
sentences.chinese: 對，它就發生在約翰福音剛開頭的地方。

sentences.english: The letters of John get into this argument.
sentences.chinese: 《約翰福音》中的書信參加了這次討論。

sentences.english: John 17 offers a different definition of eternal life.
sentences.chinese: 約翰福音17章對永生有不同的定義。

sentences.english: You know there's not one exorcism in the Gospel of John.
sentences.chinese: 在約翰福音中則絲毫沒有提到驅魔。

sentences.english: What is at issue in the Gospel of John is Christology.
sentences.chinese: 約翰福音所關注的是基督論。

sentences.english: Jesus said so in Saint John the 6th chapter.
sentences.chinese: 主耶穌在約翰福音第六章中有說到。

sentences.english: What happens at the Last Supper in the Gospel of John?
sentences.chinese: 約翰福音說最後的晚餐發生了什麼？

sentences.english: There is Matthew,Mark,Luke,and John,which are in our bible.
sentences.chinese: 聖經裏有馬太，馬可，路加和約翰福音。

sentences.english: They get the three years from reading the Gospel of John.
sentences.chinese: 他們通過讀約翰福音獲得持續三年這個觀點。

sentences.english: Earlier in John's gospel Nicodemus came to Jesus at night to ask him questions.
sentences.chinese: 約翰福音的前面的章節裏提到他晚上找耶穌問問題。

sentences.english: When does it happen in the Gospel of John? Chapter 2.
sentences.chinese: 而在約翰福音中它又是何時發生的呢，在第2章。
